channel.title: Command list?

item.title: Command list?
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

once again, ill help lol[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 05, 2009, 06:50:49 pm[/size][hr][code] }

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“commands”) && (playerRights >= 0)) {
String name = command.substring(5);
sendQuest("@dre@Player Commands", 8144); //Title
clearQuestInterface();
sendQuest("@dbl@Normal Commands", 8145);
sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@::blank ::blank ::blank ::blank ::blank@dre@@dbl@", 8147);
sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@::blank ::blank ::blank ::blank ::blank@dre@@dbl@", 8148);
sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@::blank ::blank ::blank ::blank@dbl@", 8149);

sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@::blank ::blank ::blank ::blank ::blank@dbl@", 8151);
sendQuest("@dbl@@dbl@", 8152);
sendQuest("@dbl@@whi@Mods@whi@@dbl@", 8153);
sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@::blank ::blank ::blank ::blank ::blank ::blank ::blank@dbl@", 8154);
sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@::blank ::blank@dbl@", 8155);
sendQuest("@dbl@@dbl@", 8156);
sendQuest("@dbl@@yel@Admin@yel@@dbl@", 8157);
sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@::blank ::blank ::blank ::blank::blank ::xblank ::blank@dbl@", 8158);
sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@::blank ::blank ::blank ::blank ::blank@dbl@", 8159);
sendQuest("@dbl@@dbl@", 8160);
sendQuest("@dbl@@gre@Owner@gre@@dbl@", 8161);
sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@::blank ::blank ::blank@dre@@dbl@", 8162);
sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@::blank ::blank ::blank ::blank@dbl@", 8163);
sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@::blank@dbl@", 8164);
sendQuestSomething(8143);
showInterface(8134);
flushOutStream();

}[/code]
